message.content:
I need to identify and extract the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period from the income statement.

In the income statement, the line item that represents the carrying amount of inventories sold is typically labeled as "Cost of Goods Sold" or "COGS". This represents the cost of the inventory that was sold during the period.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see there is a line item:
- "Cost of Goods Sold" with an amount of 1684000.00 on 2024-02-05

This is the value I need to extract as the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1684000.00'}}
```
